channel.title: fiona on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in fiona on Barefoot Rob

item.title: cats in Japanese class
item.description: 22:01 Monday 18 May 2015 JST Tonight in Japanese class, Tsun sat next to me as Fiona and Melanie had just joined my table. I had forgotten his name, but I remember it now! Fiona drew two cats on as many pieces of paper. The styles were quite different so I asked if she could some more for my friend of friend. Let’s hope good connections are made!
